name: mikrotik-proxy-frontend
description: Frontend server for the MikroTik Orange Pi Manager

scripts.preinstall:
node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('python3 -c "import distutils"', { stdio: 'ignore' }) } catch (e) { console.error('

====================================================================
ERROR: System dependency 'python3-distutils' is missing.
This is required to build the sqlite3 database package.
Please run the following command to install it:

  sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y python3-distutils build-essential

===================================================================='); process.exit(1) }"
